cells.data:
### Done:

- [x] Paginate /videos/top/
- [x] More detailed search.
- [x] After profling slap a Varnish server in front.

- [x] Following counts should be updated on unfollow.
- [x] Server monitoring solution in place
- [x] Run profile import on demo.
- [x] Secure EC2 Boxes
- [x] Remove CORS origin allow all in Django

- [x] Run Purge Videos on Demo Environment
- [x] Block Mozilla/5.0 Jorgee
- [x] PUT - Avatar getting 500's
- [x] Getting cache hits on /users/me/ for some reason
- [x] Varnish!
- [x] Add TTL to *ALL* calls before Varnish.
- [x] Calculate rank amount periodically
- [x] Update favorite categories for users on an interval.
- [x] Search through hashtags
- [x] Paginate the videos responses (Must)
- [x] Remove old videos that aren't processing for 
- [x] Add ordinal to categories
- [x] Random profile id's for trend setters

- [x] Load Test

- [x] Parse #'s from the video title/caption
- [x] Add average rank to videos (will have to be mocked - no ranking algorithm for V1)

- [x] Implement new /search endpoint
- [x] Update Profile serializer to render categories
- [x] Limit videos to followers
- [x] Disable /api/v1/users/ list
- [x] Update follower / following count on Profile (Make sure it's Atomic)

- [x] Cloudfront for Static
- [x] Comment out profile update on deployment

- [x] Set LightProfile model for multiple endpoints.
- [x] Remove E-Mail from serialized profile info on video detail

- [x] Ability to see who follows a user.
